en: Peppa and George are helping Grandpa Pig in his Garden.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在花园里帮猪爷爷干活。

en: What a beautiful butterfly.
Grandpa, why do butterflies like flowers?
zh: 爷爷，为什么蝴蝶会喜欢花朵呢？

en: They get their food from flowers.
zh: 它们可以从花朵里获取食物。

en: How?
They have very long tongues.
zh: 它们有一个非常长的舌头。

en: Longer than mine?
Oh, yes, the butterfly's tongue is even longer than yours.
zh: 哦，是的，蝴蝶的舌头比你的长多了。

en: She uses it to drink from the flower.
zh: 她用舌头从花朵中喝食物。

en: Peppa, the butterfly thinks you're a flower.
zh: 佩奇，蝴蝶以为你是一朵花。

en: I'm not a flower! I'm Peppa Pig!
zh: 我不是花朵！我是小猪佩奇！

en: She is so pretty.
I want to be a butterfly.
Peppa is playing at being a butterfly.
zh: 佩奇假装自己是一只蝴蝶。

en: I'm a little butterfly.
George wants to play, too.
George! I'm the butterfly!
You have to be something else.
zh: 你只能去假扮别的东西了。

en: I know! You can be a wriggly worm!
zh: 我知道了。你可以做一条蠕动的小虫！

en: Look! Look! I'm a butterfly.
Oh, dear! George does not want to be a worm.
zh: 哦，糟糕了！乔治不想做一只小虫。

en: He wants to be a butterfly.
George, when I was a little piggy, I used to like playing at being a worm.
zh: 乔治，当我还是小猪的时候，我就很喜欢扮成一条小虫。

en: It's very easy to be a worm.
I'll show you how.
First, you have to lie down on the ground.
Then, you wriggle around.
I'm a wriggly worm!
George and Grandpa Pig are having such fun being wriggly worms.
zh: 乔治与猪爷爷假扮蠕动的小虫，玩得非常开心。

en: I'm a little butterfly, I'm a little butterfly.
zh: 我是一只小蝴蝶，我是一只小蝴蝶。

en: Look! Grandpa! I'm a butterfly!
Yes, Peppa, you're a beautiful butterfly.
zh: 是的，佩奇，你是一只美丽的蝴蝶。

en: Grandpa! George! What are you doing?
zh: 爷爷，乔治，你们在干什么？

en: We are wriggly worms.
I want to be a wriggly worm, too!
zh: 我也想假扮成一条蠕动的小虫。

en: I'm a wriggly worm!
I'm a wriggly worm!
How do you do? I love you!
I'm a wriggly worm.
That was fun.
What animal do you want to be now?
zh: 你们现在还想假扮什么动物啊？

en: Hmmm! I don't know.
Look, Grandpa! There's a little frog!
Why don't you play at being frogs?
zh: 你们为什么不假扮成一只青蛙呢？

en: Hmmm, frogs are not as pretty as butterflies or as wriggly as worms.
zh: 嗯，可是青蛙没有蝴蝶那么漂亮也不会像小虫一样扭动。

en: But frogs do play a game you like.
zh: 但是青蛙会玩你喜欢的游戏。

en: Hmmm... do frogs play dolls' houses?
zh: 嗯。。。。。。青蛙会玩玩偶之家吗？

en: Silly Peppa.
What's your favorite game?
zh: 你最喜欢的游戏是什么？

en: Jumping in muddy puddles!
Yes! Frogs love jumping in muddy puddles.
zh: 是的！青蛙也喜欢在泥坑里跳。

en: Yes, George! Let's play frogs!
zh: 是的，乔治，我们来假扮青蛙吧！

en: I'm a little froggy!
I'm a little froggy!
The froggies have found a nice big muddy puddle to play in.
zh: “青蛙们”找到了一个大泥坑来玩。

en: Peppa and George love jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

en: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
zh: 大家喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

en: Butterflies and worms are very nice!
But I like frogs the best!
